## Personal Information

- **Full Name:** Sahil Chouksey
- **Professional Title:** Full Stack Developer & Applied AI Engineer
- **Location:** Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, India
- **Timezone:** IST (UTC+5:30)
- **Languages:** English, Hindi
- **Website:** https://sahilchouksey.in
- **Email:** hey@sahilchouksey.in
- **Available for:** Full-time roles, Contract work, Consulting, Open Source collaboration

---

## Professional Summary

I am Sahil Chouksey, a Full Stack Developer and Applied AI Engineer with over 3 years of professional experience building production-grade AI systems and scalable web applications. I specialize in:

- **AI/LLM Development:** Building intelligent applications using LangGraph, LangChain, and RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) architectures
- **Healthcare AI:** Developing AI-powered medical search engines and healthcare platforms
- **Full Stack Development:** Creating end-to-end web applications with modern JavaScript/TypeScript frameworks
- **Cloud Architecture:** Designing and deploying scalable systems on GCP and AWS

My approach combines deep technical expertise with a focus on building products that solve real-world problems. I'm passionate about leveraging AI to create meaningful impact, particularly in healthcare and education sectors.

### Key Strengths

1. **AI Systems Architecture:** Designing multi-agent AI systems with LangGraph for complex reasoning tasks
2. **RAG Implementation:** Building production-ready RAG systems with vector databases and semantic search
3. **Full Stack Proficiency:** End-to-end development from database design to responsive frontends
4. **Cloud-Native Development:** Containerized deployments with Docker/Kubernetes on GCP/AWS
5. **Performance Optimization:** Building high-performance, scalable applications

---

## Technical Skills

### AI/ML & LLM Technologies

| Category | Technologies |
|----------|-------------|
| LLM Frameworks | LangGraph, LangChain, LlamaIndex |
| AI Platforms | Vertex AI, Google AI Studio, OpenAI API, Anthropic Claude API |
| Vector Databases | Pinecone, Weaviate, Chroma, pgvector |
| Embeddings | OpenAI Embeddings, Vertex AI Embeddings, Sentence Transformers |
| AI Techniques | RAG, Fine-tuning, Prompt Engineering, AI Agents, Multi-Agent Systems |
| ML Libraries | TensorFlow, PyTorch (basic), scikit-learn |

### Backend Development

| Category | Technologies |
|----------|-------------|
| Languages | Node.js, Golang (Go), Python |
| Frameworks | Express.js, NestJS, FastAPI, Gin, Fiber |
| Databases | PostgreSQL, MongoDB, MySQL, Redis |
| APIs | REST, GraphQL, gRPC, WebSockets |
| ORMs | Prisma, TypeORM, Sequelize, GORM, SQLAlchemy |
| Message Queues | RabbitMQ, Redis Pub/Sub, Google Pub/Sub |

### Frontend Development

| Category | Technologies |
|----------|-------------|
| Languages | TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+), HTML5, CSS3 |
| Frameworks | React.js, Next.js, Vue.js (basic) |
| Styling | Tailwind CSS, CSS Modules, Styled Components, SASS |
| State Management | Redux, Zustand, React Query, Jotai |
| Animation | GSAP, Framer Motion, CSS Animations |
| Build Tools | Vite, Webpack, esbuild |

### Cloud & DevOps

| Category | Technologies |
|----------|-------------|
| Cloud Platforms | Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Amazon Web Services (AWS) |
| Containerization | Docker, Docker Compose, Kubernetes |
| CI/CD | GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Google Cloud Build |
| Hosting | Vercel, Cloudflare Pages, Google Cloud Run, AWS Lambda |
| Monitoring | Google Cloud Monitoring, Prometheus, Grafana |
| Infrastructure | Terraform (basic), Pulumi (basic) |

### Tools & Practices

| Category | Technologies |
|----------|-------------|
| Version Control | Git, GitHub, GitLab |

| API Testing | Postman, Insomnia, Thunder Client |

| Methodologies | Agile, Scrum, Test-Driven Development (TDD) |

## Work Experience

### Suryavanshi Ventures
**Role:** Full Stack Developer & AI Engineer
**Duration:** Current
**Location:** Remote (India)
**Website:** https://suryavanshi.io

**Responsibilities & Achievements:**

1. **BRIO Health AI Development**
   - Architected and built an AI-powered medical search engine for healthcare professionals
   - Implemented LangGraph-based multi-agent system for medical query processing
   - Integrated Vertex AI for embedding generation and semantic search
   - Developed RAG pipeline with PostgreSQL + pgvector for medical knowledge retrieval
   - Built real-time streaming responses for improved user experience

2. **Backend Architecture**
   - Designed scalable microservices architecture using Node.js and Golang
   - Implemented authentication and authorization systems
   - Built RESTful and GraphQL APIs for mobile and web clients
   - Optimized database queries and implemented caching strategies

3. **Frontend Development**
   - Created responsive React applications with modern UI/UX
   - Implemented complex state management for AI chat interfaces
   - Built real-time features using WebSockets

**Technologies Used:** LangGraph, Vertex AI, Node.js, Golang, React, Next.js, PostgreSQL, Redis, Docker, GCP

---

### TVM Consulting LLC
**Role:** Software Developer
**Duration:** Previous
**Location:** Remote

**Responsibilities & Achievements:**

1. **Web Application Development**
   - Built full-stack web applications for consulting clients
   - Developed custom CRM and business management tools
   - Implemented payment integrations and third-party API connections

2. **Technical Leadership**
   - Led technical discussions and code reviews
   - Mentored junior developers
   - Established coding standards and best practices

**Technologies Used:** Node.js, React, PostgreSQL, MongoDB, AWS

---

## Projects

### 1. BRIO Health AI
**Status:** Active / Production
**URL:** https://briohealth.ai
**Category:** Healthcare AI, Medical Technology

**Description:**
BRIO Health AI is an advanced AI-powered medical search engine designed specifically for healthcare professionals. It provides accurate, evidence-based medical information through an intuitive chat interface.

**Key Features:**
- Natural language medical queries
- Evidence-based responses with source citations
- Multi-turn conversation support
- Real-time streaming responses
- Medical knowledge base with continuous updates

**Technical Architecture:**
- **AI Engine:** LangGraph for multi-agent orchestration
- **LLM:** Vertex AI (Gemini) for response generation
- **RAG System:** PostgreSQL + pgvector for vector storage
- **Backend:** Node.js with Express.js
- **Frontend:** React with TypeScript
- **Infrastructure:** Google Cloud Platform

**Impact:**
- Helps healthcare professionals quickly access reliable medical information
- Reduces time spent searching through medical literature
- Improves clinical decision-making with AI-assisted insights

---

### 2. Soundrex
**Status:** Active
**URL:** https://soundrex.netlify.app
**GitHub:** https://github.com/sahilchouksey/soundrex
**Category:** Music Streaming, Web Application

**Description:**
Soundrex is a YouTube Music-like streaming application that provides a modern, ad-free music listening experience with beautiful UI/UX design.

**Key Features:**
- Stream music from YouTube
- Create and manage playlists
- Search for songs, artists, and albums
- Responsive design for all devices
- Dark mode interface

**Technical Stack:**
- **Frontend:** React.js, CSS3
- **APIs:** YouTube Data API, YouTube Music API
- **Hosting:** Netlify
- **State Management:** Redux

---

### 3. DOCT (Doctor on Call Technology)
**Status:** Completed
**Category:** Healthcare, Telemedicine

**Description:**
A telemedicine platform connecting patients with healthcare providers for virtual consultations.

**Key Features:**
- Video consultations
- Appointment scheduling
- Electronic health records
- Prescription management

---

### 4. Monefy
**Status:** Completed
**Category:** Finance, Personal Finance Management

**Description:**
Personal finance management application for tracking expenses and budgeting.

**Key Features:**
- Expense tracking
- Budget management
- Financial reports and analytics
- Multiple currency support

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Q: What type of projects does Sahil work on?
A: Sahil specializes in AI-powered applications, particularly in healthcare. He also builds full-stack web applications, SaaS products, and developer tools.

### Q: What is Sahil's expertise in AI?
A: Sahil has deep expertise in LangGraph, LangChain, RAG systems, and building multi-agent AI applications. He works extensively with Vertex AI and has experience integrating various LLM providers.

### Q: Is Sahil available for freelance/contract work?
A: Yes, Sahil is open to freelance and contract opportunities, particularly for AI/ML projects and full-stack development work.

### Q: What is Sahil's tech stack preference?
A: For backend, Sahil prefers Node.js or Golang with PostgreSQL. For frontend, React with TypeScript. For AI applications, LangGraph with Vertex AI or OpenAI.

### Q: Where is Sahil located?
A: Sahil is based in Jabalpur, Madhya Pradesh, India, and works remotely with teams worldwide.

### Q: What is BRIO Health AI?
A: BRIO Health AI is an AI-powered medical search engine that Sahil built for healthcare professionals. It uses LangGraph and Vertex AI to provide accurate, evidence-based medical information.
